column8: Enable modded AI for selected ships. The AI controls ship movement and target selection during battle. Currently implemented only for Guardian in Cryosleeper encounter. Requires adding -Xverify:none parameter to game vmparams file.
Should the AI attempt to maintain fleet cohesion by auto-assigning move commands to cruisers and capitals that stray off from the rest of the fleet.
Should ships on the title screen fire at asteroids.

Hotkey used to pass control of player ship omni shield to AI. The AI will take over the shield control when player is piloting manually. Indicator circle is drawn around the ship when shield is in AI control.
Override the personality of automated ships in player fleet. In vanilla, automated ships (except carriers) are locked to fearless personality.
Highlight ships controlled by AI Tweaks Custom AI.
